verses.content: Juda naupasalhai chu: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur le Sobal an nih.
Chun, Sobal naupa Reaia chun Jahath a nei a; Jahath chun Ahumai le Lahad a nei a. Hienghai hi Zorath sûngkuohai chu an nih.
Chun, hieng hi Etam pa naupa- salhai chu an nih: Jezreel, Isma le Idbas hi; chun, an farnu hming chu Hazzelelponi a nih;
Gedor pa Penuel le Husa pa Ezer. Chun, hienghai hi Hur, Beth-lehem pa Ephratha nau lutîr, naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Tekoa pa Ashhur chun nuhmei pahni: Hela le Naara chu a nei a.
Naara chun Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni le Haahastari a neipêk a. Hienghai hi Naara naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Hela naupasalhai chu: Zereth, Izhar, le Ethnan hi an nih.
Hakkoz chun Anub, Zobeba le Harum naupa Aharhel sûngkuohai chu a nei a.
Chun, Jabez chu a unauhai nêkin inza a kai lem a, a nu chun, “Lung- ngaina puma ka nei a na,” tiin a hminga chun Jabez ân bûk a nih.

Jabez chun Israel Pathien chu, “Ka lungngai nawna dinga thil ṭhanawa inthawka mi vêngin, i kut chu ka chunga a um theina dingin, nangin mal mi hung sâwmin, ka ramrihai chu hung suklien ngei i tih,” tiin a ko a. Pathien chun a hni chu a phalpêk tah a.
Chun, Kelub, Suha unaupa chun Mehir a nei a; ama chu Eston pa a nih.
Eston chun Beth-rapha, Pasea le Ir-nahas pa Tehinna chu a nei a. Hienghai hi Reka mihai chu an nih.
Kenaz naupasalhai chu: Othniel le Seraia; chun, Othniel nau- pasalhai chu: Hathath le Meonothai an nih.
Meonothai chun Ophra a nei a; Seraia chun Geharasim pa Jakob chu a nei a; anni chu mi themthiem mi an nih.
Chun, Jephunne naupa Kaleb naupasalhai chu: Iru, Ela le Naam an nih; Ela naupasal hai le Kenaz a nih.
Chun, Jehallelel naupasalhai chu: Ziph, Zipha, Tiria le Asarel an nih.
Ezra naupasalhai chu: Jether, Mered, Epher le Jalon an nih; hienghai hi Pharao naunu Mared nuhmei Bithia naupasalhai chu an nih; chun, Miriam, Sammai le Isba, Estemoa pa chu a nei bawk a.
Chun, a nuhmei Ha-jehudijah chun Gedor pa Jared le Soko pa Heber le Janoa pa Jekuthiel chu a nei a.
Chun, Naham farnu Hodia naupasalhai chu: Garmi mi Keila pa le Maakath mi Estemoa chu an nih.
Simon naupasalhai chu: Am- non, Rina, Ben-hanan le Tilon an nih. Chun, Isi naupasalhai chu: Zoheth le Ben-zoheth an nih.
Chun, Juda naupa Sela naupa- salhai chu: Leka pa Era le, Maresa pa Laada le, Asbea sûngkuo, puon zai inhmi khâwngtuhai sûngkuohai po po chu an nih;
Chun, Jokim le Kozeba mihai le Joas le Moab rama ram neitu Saraph hai le, Jasubi-lehem hai leh an nih. Hienghai hi thu hlui an nih.
Hienghai hi bêlhemtu Netaim le Gederaa um hai chu an nih: chutaka chun a sinthaw dingin lal kuomah an um a nih.
Simeon naupasalhai chu: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zera le Saul an nih:
ama naupa Sallum, ama naupa Mibsam, ama naupa Misma.
Misma naupasal chu: Hamuel, ama naupa Zakkur, ama naupa Simei.
Simei chun naupasal sâwm le paruk le naunuhmei paruk a nei a; amiruokchu, a unauhai chun nau an hau ve nawh a, Juda thlahai angin an sûngkuo khawm chu an inthla pung rak nawh a.
Anni chu Beer-seba le Molada le Hazar-sualah an um a,
chun, Bilha, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
Beth-markoboth, Hazar-susim- ah, Beth-biriah, Saaraima leh an um bawk a. Hienghai po po hi David rorêl chen khan an khawpuihai an nih.
Chun, an khawperhai chu: Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Token le Asan, khaw panga hi an nih; Baal chena a vêla an khuohai po po le chun.
Hieng hi an umna hmunhai chu a na; chun, thlatu thu ziekna khawm an nei bawk a.
Mesobab le Jamlek le Amazia naupa Josa;
chun, Joel Asiel naupa, Seraia naupa, Josibia naupa Jehu chu:
Elioenai, Jaakoba, Jesohaia, Asaia, Adiel, Jesimiel le Benaia leh;
Chun, Semaia naupa, Simri naupa, Jedaia naupa, Allon naupa, Siphi naupa Ziza;
hieng an hming hrila umhai hi an pahnama hotuhai an na; an pahnam sûngkuohai chu nasataka sukpungin an um a.
An ran ruolhai ta ding tlatna hmun zawngin phai ruom saktieng pang. Gedor lûtna chen khan an va feh a.
Chuongchun, ran ruol tlatna ding hmun ṭhatak le fâk ding tamna hmun chu an va hmu a, ram chu a lienin muong a umin, a re bawk a; chu rama lo um hmasatuhai chu Ham thlahai chu an nih.

Chun, hieng an hming ziek- hai hi Juda lal Hezekia hun laiin an hung lût a, an puon inhai an suksiet a, chutaka Meunim le chun; chuongchun, tu chena hin suksiet letdêrin an um a; anni chu an hmuna chun an ran ruol ta dingin tlatna hmun ṭha a um bawk leiin an um tah a.
Chun, anni ṭhenkhat Simeon thlahai, mi za nga zet chu Seir tlâng- ah an hang feh a, anni chun an hotuah Pelatia, Nearia, Rephaia le, Isi naupa Uzziel chu an hmang a.
Chun, Amalek mi lo tlânsuok a la mahlahai chu an that a, an hmun- a chun vawisûn ni chen hin an um tah a.
